mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_meeting_room (team_no, title, scheduled_time, scheduled_end_time, room_code, is_private, room_password_hash) VALUES (#{teamNo}, #{title}, #{scheduledTime}, #{scheduledEndTime}, #{roomCode}, COALESCE(#{isPrivate}, 'N'), #{roomPasswordHash})

INSERT INTO tb_meeting_participant (room_no, role_no, user_no, join_time, out_time) VALUES
(#{roomNo}, #{roleNo}, #{uid}, #{joinTime}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_meeting_room WHERE room_code = #{roomCode} LIMIT 1

SELECT mr.room_no AS roomNo, mr.room_code AS roomCode, mr.title AS title, mr.scheduled_time AS scheduledTime, mr.scheduled_end_time AS scheduledEndTime, mr.is_private AS isPrivate FROM tb_meeting_room mr JOIN tb_meeting_participant mp ON mp.room_no = mr.room_no WHERE (mr.scheduled_end_time IS NULL OR mr.scheduled_end_time > #{now}) AND mr.team_no = #{teamNo} AND mp.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY mr.scheduled_time DESC, mr.create_date DESC
SELECT role_no FROM tb_meeting_participant WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND user_no = #{userNo} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_meeting_participant SET join_time = COALESCE(join_time, COALESCE(#{joinedAt}, NOW())), out_time = NULL WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
UPDATE tb_meeting_participant SET out_time = COALESCE(#{leftAt}, NOW()) WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND user_no = #{userNo}
